mapper.sql: PAPER_ID, PAPER_NAME, QUESTIONS, PAPER_DIFFICULTY, PAPER_HOT, PAPER_GRADE, PAPER_COURSE, PAPER_VERSION, PAPER_ITEMS, PAPER_SCORES, SCORE, ITEM_TIME, TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from paper
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into paper (PAPER_ID, PAPER_NAME, QUESTIONS, PAPER_DIFFICULTY, PAPER_HOT, PAPER_GRADE, PAPER_COURSE, PAPER_VERSION, PAPER_ITEMS, PAPER_SCORES, SCORE, ITEM_TIME, TIME) values (#{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paperHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paperGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperScores,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into paper
PAPER_ID,
PAPER_NAME,
QUESTIONS,
PAPER_DIFFICULTY,
PAPER_HOT,
PAPER_GRADE,
PAPER_COURSE,
PAPER_VERSION,
PAPER_ITEMS,
PAPER_SCORES,
SCORE,
ITEM_TIME,
TIME,

mapper.update:
update paper
PAPER_ID = #{record.paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAPER_NAME = #{record.paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTIONS = #{record.questions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_DIFFICULTY = #{record.paperDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAPER_HOT = #{record.paperHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAPER_GRADE = #{record.paperGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_COURSE = #{record.paperCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_VERSION = #{record.paperVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_ITEMS = #{record.paperItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_SCORES = #{record.paperScores,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ITEM_TIME = #{record.itemTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update paper set PAPER_ID = #{record.paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_NAME = #{record.paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTIONS = #{record.questions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_DIFFICULTY = #{record.paperDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_HOT = #{record.paperHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_GRADE = #{record.paperGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_COURSE = #{record.paperCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_VERSION = #{record.paperVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_ITEMS = #{record.paperItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_SCORES = #{record.paperScores,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITEM_TIME = #{record.itemTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update paper
PAPER_NAME = #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTIONS = #{questions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_DIFFICULTY = #{paperDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAPER_HOT = #{paperHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAPER_GRADE = #{paperGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_COURSE = #{paperCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_VERSION = #{paperVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_ITEMS = #{paperItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_SCORES = #{paperScores,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ITEM_TIME = #{itemTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIME = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PAPER_ID = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update paper set PAPER_NAME = #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTIONS = #{questions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_DIFFICULTY = #{paperDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_HOT = #{paperHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_GRADE = #{paperGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_COURSE = #{paperCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_VERSION = #{paperVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_ITEMS = #{paperItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_SCORES = #{paperScores,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITEM_TIME = #{itemTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PAPER_ID = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
